definition: bound form used only in 苣蕒菜|苣荬菜[qu3 mai3 cai4]/Taiwan pr. [ju4]
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

sentences.english: Fated to Love was broadcast in advance in Hunan Satellite TV Station.
sentences.chinese: 湖南臺提前播出《愛上琉璃苣女孩》。

sentences.english: Two roast beef sanDwiches on white bread with lettuce and mustard.
sentences.chinese: 兩份烤牛肉三明治加蒿苣及芥末。

sentences.english: Borage Therapy delivers long lasting benefits directly to skin cells.
sentences.chinese: 琉璃苣療法帶來直接進入皮膚細胞長效的作用。

sentences.english: A new species of Chirita from Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 廣西脣柱苣苔屬一個新種。

sentences.english: Or apply a moisturiser with borage extract to tired skin.
sentences.chinese: 或也可將保溫霜混着琉璃苣萃取液塗沫於皮膚上。

sentences.english: Borage is commercially grown for the very valuable oil found in its seeds.
sentences.chinese: 琉璃苣因爲在種子發現有珍貴的油而商業性種植。

sentences.english: Integrated Utilization and Exploitation of the Special Type Oil Plant Borago Officinalis L.
sentences.chinese: 特種油料植物玻璃苣開發利用。

definition: water spinach or ong choy (Ipomoea aquatica), used as a vegetable in south China and southeast Asia/Taiwan pr. [yong1]

Manchurian wild rice (Zizania latifolia), now rare in the wild, formerly harvested for its grain, now mainly cultivated for its edible stem known as 茭白筍[jiao1 bai2 sun3], which is swollen by a smut fungus/(variant of 菇[gu1]) mushroom
plant similar to coco-grass 莎草[suo1 cao3] (classical)
a weevil found in rice etc
